text: The women's 3000 metres event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 28 and 30 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Yin Lili ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Yimenashu Taye ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Edna Kiplagat ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 30 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
